document_data.name: Tasmurand
document_data.mainbody: '''Tasmurand''' was an [[assassin]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: During his last job, he was dressed in all black. His clothes included a belt and boots.
document_data.Possessions: Besides an assortment of knives, Tasmurand was carrying, to [[Joysil Ambrur]]'s knowledge, three magical devices of note: two daggers and a small vial. The enchantment in at least one of those daggers was meant to strip away magical defenses.
document_data.Abilities: He was a deft, agile killer.
document_data.History: After [[Harnrim Starangh]] was guest to Lady Joysil Ambrur of [[Marsember]] one day in the early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}, he sent a number of assassins at her by evening; Tasmurand himself was one of those assassins. She slew most of her slayers with spells, protected by her magic; he was the last one left alive. Before slaying him, she turned into her normal form as a [[song dragon]], and killed him in that shape.
